item.title: Chrisley Knows Best Episodes
item.description: Follows Atlanta-based self-made multimillionaire Todd Chrisley, his devoted wife Julie and their five children who live a seemingly picture-perfect Southern life with everything money can buy. Chrisley Knows Best is an American reality tv-series that was first aired in 2014. See the best episodes of Chrisley Knows Best below.

item.title: Best Episodes of Monk
item.description: Adrian Monk was once a rising star with the San Francisco Police Department, legendary for using unconventional means to solve the department’s most baffling cases. But after the tragic (and still unsolved) murder of his wife Trudy, he developed an extreme case of obsessive-compulsive disorder. Now working as a private consultant, Monk continues to investigate cases in the most unconventional ways. See best Monk episodes below.
